Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory146.png'}
{3: 'White goes first. E2 to E4.'}
{3: 'Following your command, the Pawn on E2 advances two squares.'}
{3: 'Chrome slightly frowns and thinks. Then he makes up his mind.'}
{3: 'The black Pawn on the same file thus moves forward as well.'}
{3: 'The two Pawns meet in the middle of the board.'}
{3: 'Without hesitation, you issue a new command.'}
{3: "With that, the Pawn on the F-file moves next to the Pawn on the E-file, and Chrome's furrowed brows relax."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "King's Gambit?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chrome considers it.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Classic move.', 4: '1'}

{3: "As Chrome suggests, the King's Gambit is indeed a classic chess opening, offering the white Pawn on the F-file to lure the black Pawn on the E-file away. If Black takes the gambit, it will expose itself to danger."}
{3: 'Chrome has two choices—take the gambit, or refuse it.'}
{3: 'He has taken it.'}
{3: 'The chess pieces shift and move.'}
{3: 'Orderly the two of you play, issuing a new command as the other finish making their play.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, Chrome slows down, going quiet as your piece finishes moving.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'This was my seat.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'This was my seat as well.', 3: '38'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Is that so?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yeah. If we were from the same year, I'd be sitting in front of you.", 3: '40'}
{3: 'Chrome smiles.'}
{3: 'The suppressed dullness in the air around him also vanishes right as the corners of his mouth lift.'}
{3: 'The real Chrome has not shown up until this very moment.'}
{3: 'You finally say the belated greeting.'}
{2: 'Good afternoon, Chrome.', 3: '46'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Good afternoon, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Nostalgic, isn't it?", 3: '48'}
{2: 'The selection system in the Gestalt classes, things like that...', 3: '50'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Were you also bothered that you would always get picked, being the Chief?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "The Gestalt system does adjust the students' probabilities of getting selected by evaluating their attributes, that is true.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Then you must get picked a lot.', 3: '54'}
{3: 'Chrome closes his eyes.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1401.jpg'}
{3: '—Selected: Langston Smith.'}
{3: "—Please wait for the system's grading. Please answer the next question."}
{3: 'The voices from the past still echo in his ears.'}
{3: '—Is that... Langston Smith?'}
{3: "—Son of an Administrative Officer, student representative, a true genius... He's even got a pretty face... Ugh, some people really have everything!"}
{3: '—What are you inviting him for?'}
{3: "—We ain't on the same level with a genius like him."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory146.png'}
{2: 'Are you alright?', 3: '73'}
{3: "Your voice interrupts Chrome's trip down memory lane."}
{3: 'He pauses, with no intention to mask it.'}
{3: 'He nods, then he shakes his head.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I was feeling a little bad, but I'm okay now. Thanks for asking.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What happened?', 3: '79'}
{3: 'He falls silent.'}
{2: "You don't have to say anything if you don't want to.", 3: '82'}
{3: 'He reaches out to the holographic chessboard this time and picks up the projection of one of the pieces.'}
{3: 'The Knight on G8 is moved to F6.'}
{3: 'His attention reverts to the game between you.'}
{3: 'You follow suit, picking up a piece instead of issuing a command.'}
{3: 'And now, it is as if the two of you are playing a physical game of chess.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'The person who was supposed to talk before you was me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Black Queen moves from H4 to H6.'}
{3: 'White Pawn on the D-file moves from D2 to D3.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'It was canceled in the last minute.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Black Knight moves from F6 to H5.'}
{3: 'White Knight moves from F3 to F4.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "They didn't think a Construct had the right.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chrome delivers his line calmly as he gently places the Queen in his hand on G5.'}
